full_text: The Morgan Account Application: Signature Page JPMorgan J.P. MORGAN USE ONLY US907 2/99 Title Financial Trust Company, Inc. SPN 281138 Accounts Opened: ASSET PAAS BROKERAGE DDA MMIA MARGIN IM THIS APPLICATION MUST BE COMPLETED BEFORE J.P. MORGAN WILL BE ABLE TO PROVIDE FINANCIAL SERVICES. IF ANY SECTION IS INCOMPLETE, YOU WILL CONTACT ME TO OBTAIN ADDITIONAL INFORMATION. YOU WILL SEND ME A COMPLETED COPY OF THE APPLICATION, AND I MUST NOTIFY YOU OF ANY INACCURACIES WITHIN 10 DAYS OF YOUR SENDING ME A COMPLETED COPY. I MUST ALSO NOTIFY YOU OF ANY FUTURE CHANGES TO THIS INFORMATION. ABSENT NOTIFICATION, THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IN THIS FORM WILL BE DEEMED ACCURATE AND COMPLETE. A J.P. MORGAN AGREEMENT The General Terms and Agreements for Accounts and Services along with this Application and any additional Product Agreements, Fee Schedules, Disclosures and Supplemental Forms comprise the Agreement between you and me. By signing this Application, I acknowledge that I have read and agreed to all the various documents, including but not limited to, the General Terms and Agreements for Accounts and Services, Product Agreements, Fee Schedules and Disclosures which comprise the Agreements between ourselves. I understand that you do not give tax or legal advice, and that I am advised to consult a lawyer or tax advisor about tax, legal, and estate-planning issues affecting my accounts, including the way accounts are titled. B TAX CERTIFICATION I CERTIFY, AS THE ACCOUNTHOLDER SIGNING BELOW AND UNDER PENALTIES OF PERJURY, THAT (1) THE NUMBER SHOWN ON THIS APPLICATION IS MY CORRECT TAXPAYER IDENTIFICATION NUMBER, AND (2) THAT I AM NOT SUBJECT TO BACK-UP WITHHOLDING EITHER BECAUSE I HAVE NOT BEEN NOTIFIED THAT I AM SUBJECT TO BACK-UP WITHHOLDING AS A RESULT OF A FAILURE TO REPORT ALL INTEREST AND DIVIDENDS, OR THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE ("IRS") HAS NOTIFIED ME THAT I AM NO LONGER SUBJECT TO BACK-UP WITHHOLDING. (I UNDERSTAND THAT IF I HAVE BEEN NOTIFIED BY THE IRS THAT I AM SUBJECT TO BACK-UP WITHHOLDING AS A RESULT OF DIVIDEND OR INTEREST UNDERREPORTING, AND I HAVE NOT RECEIVED A NOTICE FROM THE IRS ADVISING ME THAT BACK-UP WITHHOLDING IS TERMINATED, I MUST STRIKE OR CROSS OUT THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IN ITEM 2 IN THE PREVIOUS PARAGRAPH.) THE IRS DOES NOT REQUIRE CONSENT TO ANY PROVISION OF THIS DOCUMENT OTHER THAN THE CERTIFICATION REQUIRED TO AVOID BACK-UP WITHHOLDING. C ACCOUNTS OPENED I HAVE APPLIED TO OPEN THE FOLLOWING ACCOUNTS: Asset Brokerage Investment Management Deposit D PRE-DISPUTE ARBITRATION By signing below, I acknowledge my agreement to arbitrate any controversies arising out of the Margin or Brokerage Agreements with JPMSI, in accordance with paragraph 6 of the Brokerage Agreement. SIGN HERE ALL ACCOUNTHOLDERS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN BELOW: IF SIGNATURES ARE ON BEHALF OF ENTITY ACCOUNTHOLDER, PLEASE SPECIFY NAME OF ENTITY: Financial Trust Company, Inc. 8/11/99 Jeffery Epstein Signature (Accountholder) Date Print Name Signature (Additional Accountholder) Date Print Name Signature (Additional Accountholder) Date Print Name Signature (Additional Accountholder) Date Print Name Confidential Treatment Requested by JPMorgan Chase JPM-SDNY-00065490 DOJ-OGR-00015721 907

text_blocks.content: The Morgan Account Application: Signature Page

THIS APPLICATION MUST BE COMPLETED BEFORE J.P. MORGAN WILL BE ABLE TO PROVIDE FINANCIAL SERVICES. IF ANY SECTION IS INCOMPLETE, YOU WILL CONTACT ME TO OBTAIN ADDITIONAL INFORMATION. YOU WILL SEND ME A COMPLETED COPY OF THE APPLICATION, AND I MUST NOTIFY YOU OF ANY INACCURACIES WITHIN 10 DAYS OF YOUR SENDING ME A COMPLETED COPY. I MUST ALSO NOTIFY YOU OF ANY FUTURE CHANGES TO THIS INFORMATION. ABSENT NOTIFICATION, THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IN THIS FORM WILL BE DEEMED ACCURATE AND COMPLETE.

A J.P. MORGAN AGREEMENT The General Terms and Agreements for Accounts and Services along with this Application and any additional Product Agreements, Fee Schedules, Disclosures and Supplemental Forms comprise the Agreement between you and me. By signing this Application, I acknowledge that I have read and agreed to all the various documents, including but not limited to, the General Terms and Agreements for Accounts and Services, Product Agreements, Fee Schedules and Disclosures which comprise the Agreements between ourselves. I understand that you do not give tax or legal advice, and that I am advised to consult a lawyer or tax advisor about tax, legal, and estate-planning issues affecting my accounts, including the way accounts are titled.

B TAX CERTIFICATION I CERTIFY, AS THE ACCOUNTHOLDER SIGNING BELOW AND UNDER PENALTIES OF PERJURY, THAT (1) THE NUMBER SHOWN ON THIS APPLICATION IS MY CORRECT TAXPAYER IDENTIFICATION NUMBER, AND (2) THAT I AM NOT SUBJECT TO BACK-UP WITHHOLDING EITHER BECAUSE I HAVE NOT BEEN NOTIFIED THAT I AM SUBJECT TO BACK-UP WITHHOLDING AS A RESULT OF A FAILURE TO REPORT ALL INTEREST AND DIVIDENDS, OR THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE ("IRS") HAS NOTIFIED ME THAT I AM NO LONGER SUBJECT TO BACK-UP WITHHOLDING. (I UNDERSTAND THAT IF I HAVE BEEN NOTIFIED BY THE IRS THAT I AM SUBJECT TO BACK-UP WITHHOLDING AS A RESULT OF DIVIDEND OR INTEREST UNDERREPORTING, AND I HAVE NOT RECEIVED A NOTICE FROM THE IRS ADVISING ME THAT BACK-UP WITHHOLDING IS TERMINATED, I MUST STRIKE OR CROSS OUT THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IN ITEM 2 IN THE PREVIOUS PARAGRAPH.) THE IRS DOES NOT REQUIRE CONSENT TO ANY PROVISION OF THIS DOCUMENT OTHER THAN THE CERTIFICATION REQUIRED TO AVOID BACK-UP WITHHOLDING.
C ACCOUNTS OPENED I HAVE APPLIED TO OPEN THE FOLLOWING ACCOUNTS: Asset Brokerage Investment Management Deposit

D PRE-DISPUTE ARBITRATION By signing below, I acknowledge my agreement to arbitrate any controversies arising out of the Margin or Brokerage Agreements with JPMSI, in accordance with paragraph 6 of the Brokerage Agreement.
SIGN HERE ALL ACCOUNTHOLDERS ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN BELOW: IF SIGNATURES ARE ON BEHALF OF ENTITY ACCOUNTHOLDER, PLEASE SPECIFY NAME OF ENTITY:
Confidential Treatment Requested by JPMorgan Chase JPM-SDNY-00065490 DOJ-OGR-00015721 907

additional_notes: The document appears to be a signature page for a Morgan Account application. It contains various sections including J.P. Morgan Agreement, Tax Certification, Accounts Opened, and Pre-Dispute Arbitration. The document is signed by Jeffery Epstein on 8/11/99.
